# duration

**Instance Property**

The duration of the movie, measured in seconds.

## Declaration

```swift
var duration: TimeInterval { get }
```

## Discussion

If the duration of the movie is not known, the value in this property is `0.0`. If the duration is subsequently determined, this property is updated and a [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMovieDurationAvailableNotification] notification is posted.

## Accessing the movie duration

- **playableDuration**: The amount of currently playable content.

items.description: The amount of currently playable content.
items.name: playableDuration
